column2: Have you ever smoked a cigarette, even one or two puffs?
How many cigarettes have  you smoked in your entire life? A pack usually has 20 cigarettes in it.
column17: 1 = 1 or more puffs but never a whole cigarette
column19: 3 = 11 to 20 cigarettes (about ½ pack to 1 pack)
column20: 4 = 21 to 50 cigarettes (more than 1 pack but less than 3 packs)
column21: 5 = 51 to 99 cigarettes (more than 2 ½ packs but less than 5 packs)
column22: 6 = 100 or more cigarettes (5 packs or more)

column2: Around this time 12 months ago, were you smoking cigarettes every day, some days, or not at all?
column9: ASK IF (Q1 = 1 and Q2 = 2) OR (Q1 = 1 and Q2 = 3)
